email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the low 50s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $51.75 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.75 is better, but we were hoping for $51.00. Can you meet us there? Also, can you confirm the vessel's ETA to Houston? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can do $51.25 per metric ton as a final offer. The vessel's ETA to Houston is 14 October. Let me know if we can proceed. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 works for us. Let's proceed with the MV Ocean Star for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. Please send over the charter party for review. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I'll send over the charter party shortly. The laycan remains 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Thanks for your business, Sarah.
